item.title: SharePoint 2019 and Distributed Cache failure
item.description: In some rare cases, right after the creation of a SharePoint 2019 farm, the Distributed Cache service could crash producing: .NET Runtime Error with Event Id 1026 Application Error with Event Id 1000 And none of the other solutions are able to fix the service. In this case try to: stop the cache cluster export the cache cluster settings edit the settings by changing the partition count import the settings start and stop the service again revert back the configuration and start the cluster with following scripts:
